answers.answer: Yes you do have an option as the patient they can not do anything without your consent
Be careful because when they advise you and you go against it they can tell you to find another doctor

I have Gd with all 4 of my pregnancies the earliest I was induced was 38 weeks because of my babies size and I asked. Yes you have a choice just know if your baby gets big you may have to do a c section. You do not want to have a baby with shoulder distotia. You have a choice its your baby!!!
Try talking to your doctor about it. Let them know your concerns. N ask what are your options
Thank you n thats scary bcus she is a really good doctor and i really do like her im just soo scared of labor im a ftm n isnt 37 weeks to early also?
@Kcwayman even though her weight is normal? Bcus the ultrasound said everything was perfectly fine with her weight?
37 weeks is considered full term, I think you should talk more about this with your doctor. Maybe you can ask to be induced a week later like at 38 weeks, If that would make you more comfortable

Ask your doctor for the exact reason why they've chosen 37 weeks as you have a right to understand why. Also there is no harm with getting a second or third opinion with another doctor.. just to see what they advise. It's your baby and it's precious so look at your options and make an informed decision. Of she's a good doctor then she would want you to feel comfortable with the decision.
Yea thanks ladies that help me alot i go in tomrrow so def ask more questions
I have gestational diabetes now n with my other two pregnancies n I didn't have to be induced my kids came on their own time.

question: So im 33 wks i found out i had G diabetes at 28 and i went to my daily check up and there telling me they will be inducing me at 37 wks and im just soo scared is it bcus i have diabetes?  Her weight is normal so i dont get why they have to induce me early i wanted to happen naturally :( so idk what to do can i tell them i dont want to be induce?
title: Do i have an opinion to do this?
